mapper.select: SELECT c.comments_key, c.pboard_key, c.cust_id, cu.cust_name, c.comments_content, c.comments_rdate, c.comments_update, c.parent_comment_key, c.depth, cu.cust_img AS custProfileImgUrl, pc.cust_id AS parentCustId, -- 좋아요 수: comment_likes 테이블에서 해당 댓글의 고유 사용자 수 계산 COUNT(DISTINCT cl.cust_id) AS likeCount, -- 현재 사용자 좋아요 여부: currentCustId가 null이 아니고, comment_likes에 해당 사용자 ID가 있으면 true(1), 아니면 false(0) CASE WHEN #{currentCustId} IS NULL THEN 0 -- 로그인 안 한 경우 false ELSE MAX(CASE WHEN cl.cust_id = #{currentCustId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END = 1 AS likedByCurrentUser FROM comments c LEFT JOIN customer cu ON c.cust_id = cu.cust_id LEFT JOIN comments pc ON c.parent_comment_key = pc.comments_key LEFT JOIN comment_likes cl ON c.comments_key = cl.comments_key WHERE c.pboard_key = #{pboardKey} GROUP BY -- SELECT 절의 집계 함수 외 모든 컬럼 포함 c.comments_key, c.pboard_key, c.cust_id, cu.cust_name, c.comments_content, c.comments_rdate, c.comments_update, c.parent_comment_key, c.depth, cu.cust_img, pc.cust_id ORDER BY COALESCE(c.parent_comment_key, c.comments_key), c.comments_rdate

SELECT c.comments_key, c.pboard_key, c.cust_id, cu.cust_name, c.comments_content, c.comments_rdate, c.comments_update, c.parent_comment_key, c.depth, cu.cust_img AS custProfileImgUrl, pc.cust_id AS parentCustId, -- 좋아요 수 COUNT(DISTINCT cl.cust_id) AS likeCount, -- 현재 사용자 좋아요 여부 CASE WHEN #{currentCustId} IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MAX(CASE WHEN cl.cust_id = #{currentCustId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END = 1 AS likedByCurrentUser FROM comments c LEFT JOIN customer cu ON c.cust_id = cu.cust_id LEFT JOIN comments pc ON c.parent_comment_key = pc.comments_key LEFT JOIN comment_likes cl ON c.comments_key = cl.comments_key WHERE c.comments_key = #{commentsKey} GROUP BY c.comments_key, c.pboard_key, c.cust_id, cu.cust_name, c.comments_content, c.comments_rdate, c.comments_update, c.parent_comment_key, c.depth, cu.cust_img, pc.cust_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments ( pboard_key, cust_id, comments_content, comments_rdate, comments_update, parent_comment_key, depth ) VALUES ( #{pboardKey}, #{custId}, #{commentsContent}, #{commentsRdate}, #{commentsUpdate}, #{parentCommentKey}, #{depth} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_likes WHERE comments_key = #{commentsKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET comments_content = #{commentsContent}, cust_id = #{custId}, comments_update = #{commentsUpdate} WHERE comments_key = #{commentsKey}
